meanings.definition: A condition characterized by an abnormal increase of white blood cells in the blood.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with leucoses after seeing too many white blood cells.
meanings.sent2: Leucoses can cause the blood to become thicker than normal.
meanings.sent3: The leucoses in his blood made him look like a snowman from the inside.
meanings.sent4: Her leucoses were like an army of defenders protecting her body.
meanings.sent5: The leucoses swarmed through his veins like tiny soldiers on a mission.

meanings.definition: A type of white blood cell.
meanings.sent1: The leucoses play a crucial role in fighting off infections.
meanings.sent2: White blood cells, including leucoses, are essential for a healthy immune system.
meanings.sent3: The leucoses in the body were like little warriors ready to battle any invaders.
meanings.sent4: Her leucoses were like tiny superheroes protecting her from harm.
meanings.sent5: The leucoses worked tirelessly to keep the body safe from harm.
